column4: Hey, first off i know this is the totally wrong place to ask my following question but this channel is the best there is so i'll go ahead anyway this time if thats ok. Is there any way to import/open a file (*.tiff) in Photoshop/Acrobat with OCR?
Having a hard time finding a application that can actually read Dutch characters with OCR
Any.. the dutch language is a bit different from the enligsh language :P
